ItemTooltips.flask: Good HP regen when you are low.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Allow you to chase and gives good damage.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: If you do not get Phase Boots, get these instead.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Get this if you have lots of gold early on.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Gives you more damage and lifesteal, builds from Ring of Basilius.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Gives you Mana regen and armor early on. Turn it off when in lane.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: Works with Scorched Earth making the summons more powerful.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Gives good stats and allows you to solo kill with Doom better. Do not get to caught up in chasing.
ItemTooltips.assault: Gives you lots of armor for survivabilty and attack speed for DPS.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Allows you to not get stunned while you kill enemies.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Get this early if you need more HP and regen as well as damage block.
ItemTooltips.radiance: Powerful item when you get it early. Gives good damage and powerful aura.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: A good stun and damage item.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Gives you evasion and can disarm enemy carries.

AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_devour: Gives you lots of gold through out the game.
AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_scorched_earth: Use this to chase down enemies or run away and heal.
AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_lvl_death: Use this to help get kills later on in the game.
AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_doom: Use this to totally shut down the target. Great for early ganking and winning team fights.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these when you have to.
